website_summaries.verdict: Nostalgic jukebox exterior contains state-of-the-art audio connections and an AM/FM radio. Some quality-control issues, but overall a good gift idea for music lovers.
pros: Replica of a classic late 1940s jukebox but with durable LED lighting
cons: Reports of missing or defective components on arrival

customer_reviews.title: jukebox tabletop
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited to get this Jukebox. Shipping was fast and they packed it alright. Took it out of the box and everything is there. Plugged it up and only thing was working was the lights. Nothing else. CD, Radio and MP plug......nothing of those works. Very disappointed. I am returning the product and prolly look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Soulpearls

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but delicate construction.
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot of complainers on here, but ours looks, sounds and works great! I think some people just abuse stuff badly. That's their fault, not the product. My only complaint is that yes, it WAS shipped in the manufacturers box with no outer packaging, so the surprise was ruined for my husband, but he loves it! Addendum: Well, I was proven wrong. After 6 months, the CD player stopped working. Had to send it back for repairs, which ended up being a full replacement at my cost because it was out of warranty. Bumped down my rating. CD spindle is delicate, be careful not to push in too hard or it could be damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty good but not a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Good enough sound for the novice. Nice looks for a gift but has an deep down cheapness to it that will result in a breaking front door and perhaps more over time. The audio out plugs and switches are on the reverse so you have to turn it/Wrestle it around to sinc up a player or laptop. I dont like the large transformer plug, its unsightly. Should be inside the radio. And when you pull the audio plug out the back the cardboard rear wobbles with flimsy-ness. I would buy it again but its not a forever type item.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brzozowski

customer_reviews.title: Fun to watch the lights
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and fun to look at. I got this for our 50th wedding anniversary, along with the oldies CDs. The door you open to put the CD would probably break if this were used by a family with young children, but as long as we use it carefully it should do fine. I actually turned the radio on, but turned the sound off at Christmastime just so that the flashing lights would continue to work while we had guests. The sound is good. Overall, I'd buy it again even though it isn't super high quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Reader

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY DEAD
customer_reviews.text: 100% JUNK. Only the lights on the jukebox lit up. CD AND RADIO did not work. Display lights would not come on. I was super hesitant to purchase after reading mixed reviews and I can honestly say that it is made of extremely cheap materials and feels like a kids toy. Do not waste your money! I’m returning immediately. The Victoria brand has way better reviews and is cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: but the jukebox itself is beautiful. Nice looking wood
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and my aunt loves it. The radio works very well unlike some other reviews say. The box it came in looks cheesy, but the jukebox itself is beautiful. Nice looking wood, multi-color lights, and it can be hooked up to her phone.
customer_reviews.author: Fade

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and then...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jukebox in October of last year. I was very happy with the purchase until Sat. Aug. 4, 2018. The CD player suddenly stopped working. As a matter of fact, the player had just started to play the disc and suddenly stopped. Now player only display err. It does not matter what cd is installed, the player no longer plays. Tried contacting Crosley directly. Still waiting, but their 48 hour response time is running out. Very disappointed at this point. Jukebox is too expensive for less than a year's use.
customer_reviews.author: dianita

customer_reviews.text: I received this today. For the money I paid I thought it was going to be like a different material. It's plastic. Other than that I am satisfied. Sound is really good. I love it. Well , a year later I don't love it like it did when I 1st got it. 2 months after I bought it the CD player stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Looks interesting on shelf, but as a radio it sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Looks OK, but the AM/FM Radio tuning knob seems to be directly attached to the shaft of a tuning capacitor or other device, no gear reduction, found it VERY hard to tune in a desired station on either band. It is so frustrating that I tried to sell it for half price at my Yard Sale, only no one wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex King

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter for Christmas. Right out of the box it was up and rocking! Love the record detail and lights. Sound is great. I phone plugged in without the need for any adaptors, and had no problems. CD option convenient. She loved it! Thinking of one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: L. McManus

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother for Christmas and she still talks about it ALL the time. The lights change color and it looks really great in her kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, fun little radio/cd player. Lights are really cool. Very detailed jukebox design. Speakers are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad we are on our 3rd one the CD player stops working in the 2 hopefully it doesn't in the 3rd one
customer_reviews.author: Krista Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it works before return policy date passes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this early for my wife as a gift and when I gave it to her it doesn't work! Now the item has passed its return date and don't see any other recourse.
customer_reviews.author: Freshclicks

customer_reviews.title: Love mini jukebox
customer_reviews.text: I love my mini jukebox. One thing that I wish it did is charging my ipod. Otherwise it's a cool conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Glennda Walden

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit with the  family
customer_reviews.text: A big hit with all ages. Novel for my grandchildren to see a miniature juke box plus good sound quality. Ability to play MP3 library was welcome. We purchased it for a family party and continue to play at home on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The cd player won't play , the cd tries to spin, but won't, only played it a few times, so disappointed. I really loved the looks of it, so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Garman

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is really good, lights change color
customer_reviews.text: always wanted a juke box, now I have one. The sound quality is really good ,lights change color. I connect my phone and rock out!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Sattler

customer_reviews.title: What a beautifully done piece of history
customer_reviews.text: What a beautifully done piece of history!!! Works and plays great and displays perfectly in my music room!! Thanks Crosley and Amazon for offering such a neat product.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Can load and play only one cd. Great for remembering the 50's and 60's music. Ipod plugin works but could be better with a better quality connection.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful & much larger than I expected. Sometimes I turn it on without the sound just to watch the changing lights.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H.

customer_reviews.title: CD player
customer_reviews.text: It is a present for my grandson and granddaughter and I'm sure they're going to love it
customer_reviews.author: Pissybritches

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Great sound, terrific style and changing colored lights just like a real old time jukebox. Would definitely recommend. Also love the ability to be able to play my downloaded music from my iPhone and iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She had wanted a cd player that looked like an old jukebox for a while and was thrilled ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for mother's day. She loves it. She had wanted a cd player that looked like an old jukebox for a while and was thrilled with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Angel S

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Bought it for my niece for Christmas. Other reviews are correct, it's plastic on the front. It's not really an adult toy as, but perfect for kids who want one. It looks great and sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Houchin

customer_reviews.title: Trouble returning faulty product
customer_reviews.text: The CD player on this product didn’t work. I arranged to return it but the cost was prohibitive. It was going to cost $168.00 to ship from New Zealand so it cannot be used for what we bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Looks. Well not play CD. Now. After very low use
customer_reviews.author: BILLY H MCDANIEL

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but 2 weeks later the CD player quit working
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but 2 weeks later the CD player quit working. Amazon would not do an exchange, refund only. Now the price is up $40.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed because it can’t be returned
customer_reviews.text: I have had this player for 6 months. The CD player does not work. I just tried to use it recently so I dont know is never worked or what. Extremely disappointed because it can’t be returned.

customer_reviews.title: very nice! sounds a little tinny at higher volume
customer_reviews.text: very nice! sounds a little tinny at higher volume, but a great look with the led lighting. would be a lot better with a remote.

customer_reviews.title: Our grandson was thrilled that we got this present for ...
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson was thrilled that we got this present for him. He hasn't had it long enough to say he "loves it" but it is definitely a winner.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, great detail
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, great detail and works perfect! Made the old timer grand pa really happy

customer_reviews.title: i love the look of it and was really excited to ...
customer_reviews.text: i love the look of it and was really excited to see my husband open but then it didn't work - very disappointed -

customer_reviews.title: This has been so much fun to have in our Bonus room
customer_reviews.text: This has been so much fun to have in our Bonus room. Looks really cute when the lights are blinking and glowing. Easy to take with me me to other events and reunions. Great value and sounds fine.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was great when I had to return the one damaged in ...
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was great when I had to return the one damaged in shipment. But, the new one already has huge scratches on the top from everyday use. It looks great, but isn't made well and doesn't sound that great. Luckily my 12 year old doesn't care :)
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: ... - they replaced it and the new one is GREAT. Fun to have in our home
customer_reviews.text: The first one we recieved had to be sent back - they replaced it and the new one is GREAT. Fun to have in our home.

customer_reviews.title: CD player quit working in the first two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: It worked good for a couple weeks then the CD player quit working.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice looking unit but very poor quality controls and the plate for the emblem on the bottom came off

customer_reviews.title: 5 star Jukebox!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best items ordered from Amazing Amazon! Very colorful and the sound Is good just what I wanted! Thank You!

customer_reviews.title: This jukebox is beautiful, works great and sounds amazing
customer_reviews.text: This jukebox is beautiful,works great and sounds amazing! Would definitely recommend this.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with clarity of the speaker and love the lights on it
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to my husband and he listen's to it everyday. Very impressed with clarity of the speaker and love the lights on it. I would recommend this Cd player.

customer_reviews.text: on off switch & volume is touchy, radio is good, we have it on remote control switch to save on use of on &off & volume switch

customer_reviews.text: my youngest grand daughter Loves her jukebox, she has a ball with it while her friends are here. Sound is great

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The CD player would not work. Ordered replacement and cd would not turn.

customer_reviews.text: Quite happy with this ! Sounds great and lights are so colorful .

customer_reviews.title: Fun product

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and beautiful design at a fraction of the price of other jukebox facsimiles.

customer_reviews.title: Does not take up much space and great for playing CDS
customer_reviews.text: Really cute little jukebox. Does not take up much space and great for playing CDS!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Play's fantastic. Would be better if it was Bluetooth ,but we are happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased. Wish it came with a remote. But still very pleased. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is super cool. The only complaint I have is the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is super cool. The only complaint I have is the CD door and flip down control panel door are plastic and could probably be easily broken. But other than that, it is really gorgeous. Sounds great too!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Entz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have in my shop and I listen to my music on iPod and CD's.
customer_reviews.author: Larry K.

customer_reviews.title: ... as a birthday gift for my wife and she loved it. The LEDs quit working after only 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my wife and she loved it. The LEDs quit working after only 4 months with only 2 or 3 hours of daily use. No other problems with the unit but the LEDs were a really cool touch and added ambiance. There is a one year warranty with this item so I guess I'll go that route. If you purchase this product, be sure to save the receipt and the original box and be prepared to pay for all shipping. I will try and update later on how Crosley handles this. If the LEDs were still functioning, I would have gave this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C. Allen, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Dont rock the jukebox!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It is super cute and sounds great. I just wish for 2 changes. 1. Dont use such cheap pladtic and get rid of dial for the radio.
customer_reviews.author: reenplease

customer_reviews.title: I love this item though
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem but amazon is helping me to solve it . I love this item though. but the cd gave up after 6 times of use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fun purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit at our annual Christmas party- the radio is a bit off, sometimes works, then doesn't,but the CD player has great sound and we love the way it changes colors and flashes as the music plays.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy A. Steklenski

customer_reviews.title: Does not work...
customer_reviews.text: Well... I ordered three of them for a show. First one arrived in its original box and does not turn on. bad idea to ship in its box without additional protection. I'm sure it was thrown around in shipping. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. I would not even give one star
customer_reviews.text: This does not work. Won't even turn on. Christmas gift for my daughter! Just spoiled her day. Not happy. I would not even give one star, but cannot post a review without one
customer_reviews.author: Prestop

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I have the full size and now the table top. Both are awesome. Used a Bluetooth hook up and jamming to tunes within 3 min. Worth it. Thank you Crosley for another cool and quality jukebox
customer_reviews.author: darryle guarino

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: It is a terrible product. The first one I received would not turn on and in the replacement one, the CD player didnt work. I ended up returning both.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Drizin

customer_reviews.title: CROSLEY CR1101A-CH JUKEBOX WITH CD PLAYER
customer_reviews.text: GREAT, I BOUGHT THIS AS A GIFT, THANK YOU AMAZON!

product_meta.title: Crosley CR1101A Old Retro Style Mini Replica Color-Changing CD Jukebox
product_meta.description: The Crosley CR1101 is a reproduction of the classic 1947 jukebox that takes you back to that ever-so-fond memory of sitting in your favorite diner slurping a milkshake and rockin' around the clock. The song chart flips to reveal the tuning dial and volume control, while the color shifting LED lights provide a little bit of ambience. The handcrafted wood and veneer cabinet features a CD player, AM/FM radio and portable audio input for connecting smartphones or other external audio devices.
feature_bullets: The handcrafted wood and veneer cabinet features a compact disc player, AM/FM radio and portable audio input for connecting smartphones or other ex-ternal audio devices.
Programmable 20-Track Memory, LED Display, Repeat Play
Portable Audio Ready-Simply Plug In Your Portable Audio Device Or MP3 Player

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars122 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
